text: Giovanni Andrea Darif (1801–1870) was an Italian painter, mainly of religious subjects and portraits in a Neoclassical style. He was active in Udine, Milan and the Comasco.Dizionario Bibliografico of the Friuli. ==Biography== He was born in either Venice dizionariobiograficodeifriulani.it, to a librarian in Udine. He trained at the Accademia di Belle Arti di Venezia under Teodoro Matteini.
